page.title: 14RECREATION
page.content: CLUBS OF WARMSWORTH Around Warmsworth are many clubs allowing many people to join. There are two{youth clubs}in the area. One is held at{Warmsworth Middle School} and the other at the{Quaker Meeting {House.}The longest running clubs in Warmsworth are the{cricket club}and the{over sixties club.} The{Scouts}are held at the community centre on a Monday night. It has twenty two members. There are also cubs which has a lot of members which is held on two nights a week. There is a luncheon club for pensioners. There are two {football clubs}in our area. One is the{Edlington White Stars,}the other is{Warmsworth Lions.}There is also a{ {computer club}in the area. It is held at the{Graceholme Working Mens Club.}
